summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new features: Dynamic pricing system, Upsells system, and Stay reason field. All 14 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly.
passed_tests: API /api/stay-reasons - returns 7 stay reason options (vacanza, romantico, famiglia, etc.)
API /api/upsells - returns all upsells with correct structure
API /api/upsells?active_only=true - filters to active upsells only
API /api/upsells - upsell 'pulizia-extra' has min_nights=7 (only for stays >= 7 nights)
API /api/upsells POST - creates new upsell successfully
API /api/upsells PUT - toggles upsell active status
API /api/custom-prices POST - sets custom prices for date range
API /api/custom-prices GET - retrieves custom prices for room
API /api/custom-prices DELETE - deletes specific custom price
API /api/bookings POST - creates booking with upsells and stay_reason
API /api/bookings - calculates price correctly with custom prices
API /api/availability - includes custom_prices in response
Booking page: Room selection works (Stanza della Nonna, Stanza del Pozzo)
Booking page: Calendar date selection works
Booking page: Stay reason field present ('Motivo del soggiorno')
Booking page: Upsells section appears after date selection
Booking page: Upsells display with persuasive descriptions (Bollicine di Benvenuto, Sapori di Puglia, etc.)
Booking page: Upsell selection shows checkmark
Booking page: Summary updates with selected upsells (Extra selezionati)
Booking page: Total price calculates correctly with upsells
Admin page: Login works with admin/admin credentials
Admin page: Prezzi tab shows dynamic pricing form
Admin page: Prezzi tab has room selection, calendar, price input, reason input
Admin page: Upsells tab shows upsell management
Admin page: Upsells tab has create new upsell form
Admin page: Upsells tab lists existing upsells with toggle buttons
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: AdminPage.js has ESLint warning about missing dependency 'fetchData' in useEffect - not critical but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Default upsells initialized on app startup (6 upsells: prosecco, vino-locale, sup-mare, spesa-arrivo, pulizia-extra, colazione-premium)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features (dynamic pricing, upsells, stay reason) are fully functional. The booking route is /booking (not /prenota). Admin login uses admin/admin credentials. Upsell 'pulizia-extra' only appears for stays >= 7 nights.
